remarks: Calculate the value of the ` Line ` function.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
fvline $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ A =/= B ) ) -> ( A Line B ) = { x | x Colinear <. A , B >. } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
